skill.name: report-generator
skill.description: Generate professional markdown and HTML reports from data with charts, tables, and analysis.
skill.summary: Generate professional markdown and HTML reports from data with charts, tables, and analysis.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only instructional content for generating reports. No scripts, network calls, file system access, or external command execution detected.

content.value_statement: Transform raw data into polished reports. Create markdown, HTML, and PDF documents with charts, tables, and executive summaries.
actual_capabilities: Generate markdown reports with tables and formatting
Create HTML reports with embedded CSS styling
Build data visualizations including bar, line, pie, and scatter charts
Produce executive summaries with key metrics and recommendations
Analyze data patterns, correlations, and trends
limitations: Cannot directly access external files without user-provided data
Does not include runtime code execution capabilities
Chart generation requires integration with charting libraries
PDF export depends on external conversion tools

use_cases.title: Data analysis reports
use_cases.description: Generate comprehensive analysis reports with statistical summaries and correlation matrices.

use_cases.title: Executive dashboards
use_cases.description: Create high-level summary reports with key metrics and performance indicators.

use_cases.title: Technical documentation
use_cases.description: Build technical reports with code examples, performance metrics, and comparison data.

prompt_templates.title: Basic data report
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the report-generator skill to analyze this data and create a markdown report with an executive summary, key metrics, and data quality analysis.

prompt_templates.title: Performance comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a performance comparison report showing baseline versus current metrics with change percentages and status indicators.

prompt_templates.title: HTML visualization
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an HTML report with styled tables, metric cards, and interactive Chart.js visualizations for web display.

prompt_templates.title: Full analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Produce a comprehensive data analysis report including statistical summary, distributions, correlations, and actionable insights.

output_examples.input: Generate a report for this sales data with executive summary and charts.

best_practices: Include executive summary at the beginning of long reports
Use tables for structured data and charts for trends
Add timestamps and data sources for traceability
anti_patterns: Avoid overloading reports with too many sections
Do not skip data quality validation steps

faq.question: What file formats does this skill support?
faq.answer: Works with data passed directly. Generates markdown, HTML, and PDF outputs. CSV and JSON data can be analyzed directly.

faq.question: What are the size limits for data?
faq.answer: Performance depends on the host AI model context limits. For large datasets, summarize or sample data before report generation.

faq.question: Can I customize report templates?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill supports custom templates with sections for summary, metrics, analysis, recommendations, and visualizations.

faq.question: Is my data kept private?
faq.answer: Data processing occurs within your AI session. No data is sent to external services. Review your AI provider's privacy policy.

faq.question: Why are charts not rendering?
faq.answer: Ensure chart data contains labels and values arrays. For HTML reports, Chart.js loads from CDN. PDF export requires markdown conversion.

faq.question: How does this compare to other tools?
faq.answer: Unlike standalone tools, this skill integrates directly into AI conversations for seamless report generation from chat context.
